sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Apple (AAPL) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 3.0%.
Year to date, Apple registers a 26.6% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Procter & Gamble Company (PG), trading down 0.5%.
Procter & Gamble Company is showing a gain of 20.2% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Coca-Cola (KO), trading down 0.1%, and Intel Corp (INTC), trading up 2.8% on the day.
